T02D3265:19b-1: mee tri ya s'a dha nam /
T02D3265:19b-4: sngar bshad ba'i cho ga'i rim pas zla ba'i dkyil
T02D3265:19b-5: 'khor gyi steng du yi ge me ser po yongs
T02D3265:19b-6: gyur pa las 'phags pa mgon po byams pa padma
T02D3265:19b-7: 'dab ma sna tshogs pa'i steng na bzhugs pa'i zhal
T02D3265:19b-9: g-yas pa dang g-yon gyi zhal dag ni nag po dang dkar po'o //
T02D3265:19b-10: gser gyi mdog ltar ser bar gyur pa phyag gnyis ni chos bshad pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa /
T02D3265:19b-11: g-yas kyi phyag gnyis pa ni mchog sbyin par mdzad cing /
T02D3265:19b-12: g-yon gyi phyag gnyis pa ni me tog kha bye
T02D3265:19b-13: ba'i klu shing gi rtse mo sdu gu bsnams pa'o
T02D3265:19b-14: // lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang na bzas rnam par
T02D3265:19b-15: mdzes par gyur pa'i skur bdag nyid mngon sum du
T02D3265:19b-16: // byas te / phyag rgya bcing bar bya ba
T02D3265:19b-17: las de la lag pa gnyis kyis so so so
T02D3265:19b-18: sor khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis mthe bong
T02D3265:19b-19: dag gi dbus su nye bar bzhag pas /
T02D3265:19b-20: me tog gi rnam par gshibs par bya ba'o //
T02D3265:19b-22: aom mee tri ya sv'a h'a /
